page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN 04320123
page.content: The mainly{agricultural}landscape provides employment in farming, horticulture and market gardening. There are also the deposits of clay, sand and gravel in the area which give rise to the{extractive {industries.}The employment they provide may be welcomed but there are concerns among the rural residents that the heavily-laden traffic that they create and restoration plans for extraction sites are problems that need to be closely monitored. Other than the{Michelmersh Brick {Company}and{Kent's Oak Mushroom Farm there are no other major employers in the area. A couple of garages and individual businesses such as decorators, electricians, plumbers and gardeners etc. provide some work, but many of the residents work away from the villages.
